author: earthmercedes
content:
I am a senior blockchain and full-stack developer with over 9 years experience.
Nowadays I am focus on some blockchain stacks such as bitcoin ordinals, blockchain bot development(nft sniper bot, nft mint bot ...), zk-rollup, smart contract, erc404, web3 and web development.
Now I am looking for the project to support with my skill and experience.
As a senior developer, I hope a good community and collaboration.
Please refer to my cover letter
